## WorkerBasedTiler.registerIndex() method

Register index in the tiler. Indexes registered in the tiler can be later used to retrieved tiled payloads using `getTile`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerIndex(indexId: string, input: URL | GeoJson): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  indexId | string | Index identifier. |
|  input | URL \| [GeoJson](./harp-datasource-protocol.geojson.md) | Url to the index payload, or direct GeoJSON. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
